sentence: Rising to his defense was Congressman Paul Gosar of Arizona, one of the Republicans with his own deep connections to the Jan. 6 insurrection, who demanded that federal authorities explain Fuentes’ supposed ban.
title: White nationalist Fuentes gets subpoena from Jan. 6 committee, but he’s preparing for mockery

sentence: Rising to his defense was Congressman Paul Gosar of Arizona, one of the Republicans with his own deep connections to the Jan. 6 insurrection, who demanded that federal authorities explain Fuentes’ supposed ban.
author: David Neiwert
title: Jan 6 Committee Subpoenas White Nationalist Nicholas Fuentes

sentence: That could be bad news for MAGA Reps. Paul Gosar, Andy Biggs and Mo Brooks.
author: NewsHound Ellen
title: ‘Stop The Steal’s’ Ali Alexander Flips?

sentence: That’s why they’re coming after me, and they’re coming after Andy Biggs, Paul Gosar, they went after Madison [Cawthorn].” And who does Greene believe is behind it?
author: Kristen Doerer
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Says Legal Challenge to Take Her Off the Ballot Is a ‘Globalist’ Ploy for a ‘One World Government’
